text: Xiong Zi (born ) is a Chinese female volleyball player, playing as an outside hitter. She was part of the China women's national volleyball team. She participated in the 2002 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship. She won the gold medal at the 2002 Asian Games. She competed in Beach Volleyball, at the 2000 Summer Olympics. On club level she played for Sichuan in 2002. == References == == External links == * Player info FIVB * Player info CEV * * Xiong Zi at Sports Reference * http://www.bvbinfo.com/Player.asp?ID=1291 Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female beach volleyball players Category:Volleyball players at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in volleyball Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Beach volleyball players at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic beach volleyball players of China Category:Outside hitters
title: Xiong Zi (volleyball)
